title: Punch bowl
marks: Signature on each side above base, in relief: [A/M]
description: boat-shaped top with domed cover with organic incised designs; cylindrical lower section with columnar \"handles\" from boat shape to base; incised arc designs around bottom of base; conical green glass insert (no longer removable due to bends in rim); silver patina
creditline: Gift of funds from the Decorative Arts Council with proceeds from the 2006 Antiques Show and Sale
